full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for PDQ Deploy & Inventory

**Contract Title**: PDQ Deploy & Inventory per Admin
**Ref Number**: SSC-22-00020777:T
**Solicitation Number**: BPM017386/20777

**Closing Date**: 2022-12-01T14:00:00

## Overview

Shared Services Canada is inviting proposals for the PDQ Deploy & Inventory per Admin contract. The contract aims to provide deployment and inventory management for administrative purposes.

**Key Details**

* **GSIN Code**: AJ212516 - Communications Network Software (R&D)
* **Procurement Category**: Service
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (except NCR)

## Tender Requirements

The contractor must provide deployment and inventory management services for administrative purposes. The contractor is expected to:

* Implement and maintain a reliable deployment and inventory management system
* Conduct regular backups and ensure data integrity
* Provide training and support to end-users

**Submission Requirements**

Submissions must be in compliance with the associated solicitation documents and must be submitted electronically via the Government of Canada tendering system.

**Contact Information**

For technical and administrative inquiries, please contact:

* Christiane Joanisse
* christiane.joanisse@ssc-spc.gc.ca
* 3435499457

## Attachments

The tender document and associated solicitation documents can be downloaded from the following link:
https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/8E7BF332-0A98-44A6-A214-BD8FD91C5E05

This tender announcement has been made available in both English and French. [End of Entry]

Note: Given the space limit, I have only included the essential information in the rewritten entry. Please let me know if you want me to add any additional details.
